name: Cluster Title: Cancel Order
description: These questions are from customers who want to cancel an order they have placed.

name: Cluster Title: Modify Order
description: These questions are from customers who want to modify an order they have placed, such as adding, removing, or swapping items.

name: Cluster Title: Order Editing
description: Questions related to modifying existing orders, including adding, removing, or swapping items.

name: Cluster Title: Order Deletion
description: Questions related to deleting items or entire orders.

name: Cluster Title: Shipping Address Modification
description: Questions related to changing or correcting the shipping address associated with an order.

name: Cluster Title: Address Modification
description: Questions about changing or updating the delivery or shipping address.

name: Cluster Title: Early Termination Fees
description: Questions about seeing or checking the early termination, withdrawal, or cancellation fees or penalties.

name: Cluster Title: Invoice Locating
description: Questions about finding, checking, or looking for invoices or bills from a specific person or company.

name: Invoice Lookup Assistance
description: Customers seeking help to find or view their invoices.

name: Payment Method Inquiry
description: Customers asking about accepted payment methods or how to check available payment options.

name: Cluster Title: Inquiry about accepted payment methods
description: Questions related to finding out the payment methods accepted by the company.

name: Cluster Title: Inquiry about refund policy
description: Questions related to the company's refund policy, including how long refunds take and under what circumstances refunds can be requested.

name: Cluster Title: Refund Policy Inquiries
description: Questions from customers seeking clarification on the company's refund policy, including timeframes and eligibility criteria.

name: Cluster Title: File a Claim or Complaint
description: Customers expressing dissatisfaction with the company's products or services and seeking assistance with filing a claim or complaint.

name: Cluster Title: Customer Support Contact Information
description: Customers looking for information on how to contact customer support, including phone numbers, email addresses, and operating hours.

name: Cluster Title: Hours of Availability
description: Customers asking about the hours they can reach customer support or assistance.

name: Cluster Title: Contact Customer Support
description: Customers asking for help to contact or speak with customer support.

name: Cluster Title: Talk to Agent
description: Customers wanting to talk to a person, agent, or live agent.

name: Cluster Title: Email or Phone Number
description: Customers asking for email addresses or phone numbers for customer support.

name: Cluster Title: Free Support
description: Customers asking for free customer support or assistance.

name: Cluster Title: Need Help
description: Customers explicitly stating they need help with an issue.

name: Cluster Title: Check Hours
description: Customers asking how to check the hours of customer support.

name: Cluster Title: Talk to Customer Service
description: Customers wanting to talk to customer service specifically.

name: Cluster Title: Assistance with Contacting
description: Customers asking for assistance in contacting customer support.

name: Cluster Title: Unhelpful Bot
description: Customers expressing dissatisfaction with the bot and requesting to speak to a human.

name: Cluster Title: Contact Assistance
description: Customers asking to get in touch with customer assistance.

name: Cluster Title: Talk to Live Agent
description: Customers wanting to talk to a live agent specifically.

name: Cluster Title: Speak with Human Agent
description: Questions about how to speak with a human agent or operator.

name: Cluster Title: Create Account
description: Questions about how to create a new account or open a specific type of account.

name: Cluster Title: Account Creation
description: Questions related to creating a new account.

name: Cluster Title: Account Deletion
description: Questions related to deleting or closing an existing account.

name: Cluster Title: Shipping Inquiries
description: Questions related to shipping options, delivery methods, and order placement from specific locations.

name: Shipping Method Inquiry
description: Customers asking about the available shipping methods or how to check them.

name: Delivery Country Inquiry
description: Customers asking if orders can be placed from a specific country.

name: Delivery City Inquiry
description: Customers asking if orders can be placed from a specific city.

name: Shipment Options Inquiry
description: Customers asking for help to see what delivery options they have.

name: Cluster Title: Shipping Inquiry
description: Customers asking about the delivery time or shipping period of their order.

name: Cluster Title: Account Editing
description: Customers seeking help to edit or modify their account details.

name: Cluster Title: Account Information Modification
description: Questions related to changing or modifying personal information on different types of accounts.

name: Cluster Title: Invoice Download Assistance
description: Questions related to downloading invoices, including requests for help, inquiries about the download process, and lost invoice requests.

name: Cluster Title: Refund Requests
description: Questions related to requesting refunds or compensation for money paid for products or services.

name: Cluster Title: Requesting Refunds/Rebates
description: This group includes questions from customers who are unsure about how to request a refund or rebate, or who need assistance with the process.

name: Cluster Title: Receiving Restitutions/Reimbursements
description: This group encompasses questions from customers who want help in receiving restitutions or reimbursements for money they have paid.

name: Cluster Title: Company Newsletter Subscription
description: This group includes questions related to subscribing, unsubscribing, and receiving the company newsletter.

name: Subscription Inquiries
description: These questions are about subscribing or unsubscribing to the company newsletter.

name: Payment Issues
description: These questions are about problems with online payment or reporting errors with payment.

name: Ordering Assistance
description: These questions are about ordering a product or needing help to buy items.

name: Purchase Questions
description: Questions about how to make a purchase or order products.

name: Password/PIN Recovery Questions
description: Questions about resetting or recovering user account passwords or PIN codes.

name: Forgotten PIN/Password Recovery
description: Customers who have forgotten their PIN or password and need help recovering or resetting it.

name: Sign-Up Issues
description: Customers who are experiencing issues with the sign-up process.

name: Cluster Title: Sign-up Errors
description: Questions related to experiencing issues during the sign-up process and seeking assistance on how to report or resolve these issues.

name: Cluster Title: Leaving Feedback
description: Questions related to leaving feedback, reviews, or comments about a product, service, or company, and seeking assistance on how to do so.

name: Cluster Title: Shipping Address Issues
description: Questions related to encountering problems while entering or setting up a shipping address, and seeking assistance on how to resolve these issues.

name: Cluster Title: Delivery Address Setup Issues
description: Customers are experiencing problems setting up or submitting their delivery addresses.

name: Cluster Title: Shipping Address Validation Issues
description: Customers are encountering validation errors when trying to set up or submit their shipping addresses.

name: Cluster Title: Account Switching Issues
description: Customers are having trouble switching to different account types or profiles.

name: Account Change Inquiries
description: These are questions from users who want to change their account type or category. They might be asking for help, instructions, or expressing confusion about the process.

name: Account Usage Inquiries
description: These are questions from users who need help using a specific account type or category. They might be asking for instructions, clarification, or troubleshooting assistance.

name: Profile Usage Inquiries
description: These are questions from users who need help using a specific profile within their account. They might be asking for instructions, clarification, or troubleshooting assistance.

name: Order Status Inquiries
description: These are questions from users who want to check the status of their order. They might be asking for instructions, clarification, or troubleshooting assistance.

name: Order Status Inquiry
description: Customers asking for help to check the current status or ETA of their order.

name: Refund Inquiry
description: Customers inquiring about the status of their refund.
